form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION SERVICE, NOTICE TO APPLICANT AND PHYSICIAN OR CLINIC

full_text: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION SERVICE John Fitzgerald Kennedy Federal Building Boston, Massachusetts 02203 SPECIAL NOTICE TO APPLICANT AND PHYSICIAN OR CLINIC As part of the required medical examination to be given you by the United States Public Health Service, you must present in person at the United States Public Health Service Hospital at the time and place noted on the attached appointment letter: 1. X-ray film taken and interpreted at an accredited hospital or clinic 2. Report of serologic test for syphilis The X-ray film, report of its interpretation and the report of the blood test for syphilis should be given to you sealed by the physician or clinic and you should present the X-ray film and the reports when you appear at the United States Public Health Hospital, 77 Warren Street, Brighton, Massachusetts for examination by a United States Public Health Surgeon. PLEASE GO FOR THESE TESTS IMMEDIATELY. PLEASE SHOW THIS NOTICE TO YOUR PHYSICIAN OR CLINIC. IF YOU DO NOT HAVE THE X-RAY FILM AND REPORTS WITH YOU, THE MEDICAL EXAMINATION CANNOT BE GIVEN YOU BY THE UNITED STATES PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE AND YOU SHOULD REQUEST ANOTHER APPOINTMENT FROM THE IMMIGRATION AND NATU- RALIZATION SERVICE. NOTE: You should not go to the U.S. Public Health Hospital before the time shown on the attached appointment notice.
